title: Blockchain Certificates Version 1.2.0 Schema
description: A schema for representing certificates on the blockchain

JsonLdContext.description: A link to a valid JSON-LD context file, that maps term names to contexts. Blockchain certificates contexts extend Open Badges contexts, and also define JSON-schema to validate blockchain certificates against.

JsonLdType.description: A type or an array of types that the blockchain certificate object represents. The first or only item should be 'BlockchainCertificate', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, there will be only one type: 'BlockchainCertificate'
